AT.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
AT.description: Wenn du die Wii U™-Version herunterlädst, bekommst du die Nintendo 3DS™-Version kostenlos dazu! (Deine Wii U und dein Nintendo 3DS müssen mit derselben Nintendo Network ID verknüpft sein.) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu finden Sie eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt.

AU.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
AU.description: If you download the Wii U™ version, you can get the Nintendo 3DS™ version for free! (Your Wii U and Nintendo 3DS must be linked with the same Nintendo Network ID) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BE.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
BE.description: Si vous téléchargez la version Wii U™, vous pourrez obtenir la version Nintendo 3DS™ gratuitement ! (Votre Wii U et votre Nintendo 3DS doivent être liées au même identifiant Nintendo Network) Profitez de plus grandes énigmes de mots avec ce pare-chocs collection de six nouveaux jeux! Résolvez des centaines de casse-tête à l'aide du stylet et des commandes intuitives de l'écran tactile. Obtenez des défis supplémentaires en touchant un amiibo™ à générer des puzzles spéciaux, juste pour vous! Ces puzzles sont inclus: Word Maze Trouver les mots et résoudre le labyrinthe! Mixups Un puzzle anagramme diaboliquement difficile avec trois mots pêle-mêle! One Word La recherche de mots où il ya un seul mot à trouver! Flowers Disposer paires de lettres pour faire six mots. Circles Trois cercles qui se chevauchent cachent trois mots connectés. Trouver la lettre manquante de les déchiffrer! Crossovers Mots croisés avec une seule lettre manquante, qui se rejoignent pour résoudre un indice! Puzzles POWGI sont tous soigneusement fabriqués à la main pour votre plaisir et le plaisir déroutant! Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS.

IT.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
IT.description: Se scarichi la versione Wii U™, ottieni gratis anche Nintendo 3DS™! (I tuoi Wii U e Nintendo 3DS devono essere collegati con lo stesso Nintendo Network ID.) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS. Il lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS sarà disponibile quest'anno.

NL.description: Als je de Wii U™ versie download, kan je de Nintendo 3DS™ versie gratis ontvangen! (Je Wii U en Nintendo 3DS moeten gekoppeld zijn aan dezelfde Nintendo Network ID.) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig. De NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS zal later dit jaar beschikbaar komen.

PT.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
PT.description: Se fizeres o download da versão para a Wii U™, podes obter gratuitamente a versão para a Nintendo 3DS™! (As consolas Wii U e Nintendo 3DS devem estar vinculadas à mesma Nintendo Network ID.) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS.

RU.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
RU.description: Загрузив версию игры для Wii U™, вы сможете получить версию для Nintendo 3DS™ бесплатно! (Ваши системы Wii U и Nintendo 3DS должны быть зарегистрированы с помощью одного и того же кода Nintendo Network) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS.
